statements: SELECT * FROM students WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT student_id, first_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age < 25 AND grade_level > 8 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level BETWEEN 9 AND 12 ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level = 12 ORDER BY age ASC, first_name ASC
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE age >= 20 AND grade_level < 12 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT age, grade_level FROM students WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE '%son'
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 15 AND 17 ORDER BY first_name, last_name DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, math_score FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT student_name, english_score FROM students WHERE math_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, subject, grade_letter FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, math_score, english_score FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10 AND math_score >= 90;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, math_score, english_score FROM students WHERE english_score < 70 ORDER BY grade_level ASC;
SELECT student_name, subject, grade_letter FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, grade_level, math_score, english_score FROM students WHERE grade_level BETWEEN 7 AND 9 ORDER BY math_score DESC, english_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_id, grade_level FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students s JOIN grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id JOIN courses c ON g.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY student_name, course_name;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade > 90
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = grades.course_id WHERE grade <= 70
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT course_name, COUNT(grade) AS count FROM courses JOIN grades ON courses.course_id = grades.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING count > 3
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, first_name, major FROM students ORDER BY major;
SELECT course_name, department, instructor FROM courses WHERE department = 'Math';
SELECT student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age >= 20 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, major FROM students WHERE GPA > 3.5;
SELECT course_name, department, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'Professor Smith';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, date FROM attendance WHERE present = TRUE ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT name, grade FROM students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_title, max_score FROM assignments WHERE max_score < 100;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT e.enrollment_id, s.name, c.course_name, e.enrollment_date, e.grade FROM enrollments e JOIN students s ON e.student_id = s.id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE e.grade IN ('A', 'B') ORDER BY e.enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT a.assignment_title, a.due_date, MAX(g.score) AS max_score FROM assignments a JOIN grades g ON a.assignment_id = g.assignment_id GROUP BY a.assignment_title, a.due_date;

SELECT g.enrollment_id, s.name, c.course_name, a.assignment_title, g.score FROM grades g JOIN enrollments e ON g.enrollment_id = e.enrollment_id JOIN students s ON e.student_id = s.id JOIN assignments a ON g.assignment_id = a.assignment_id WHERE g.score >= 90;
